tool_description: Pacer API, Public Access to Court Electronic Records, is an API for US Court Case Search. This API requires Pacer account. You can register it for free at http://www.pacer.gov/register.html
name: Pacer Case Search
title: Pacer Case Search

api_list.name: Pacer

required_parameters.name: sel_court
required_parameters.description: court type, such as bankrupt (bk), Civil (ci), Criminal (cr) and etc
